ValidationRule.description: If Packing List is selected on the account as an international document, require the checkbox so documentation is sent.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( INCLUDES( Account.International_Documentation_Checklist__c , "Packing List"), Packing_List__c = FALSE, OR ( RecordType.Name = "Changes", RecordType.Name = "Orders" ), OR ( ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed - Approved"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed - Rejected") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure this documentation has been sent before the case is closed.
